`[`*[DeveloperAPIMonitorExceptions Prev - Syncless.Monitor.Exceptions]* `|` *[DeveloperAPIProfiling Next - Syncless.Profiling]*`]`

Provides classes which enclose information needed to send notification among classes and between main logic layer and user interface layer.

= Interfaces Summary =

|| || *Interface* || *Description* ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubinterface.gif || [#INotificationQueue INotificationQueue] || Interface for implementing a notification queue. Classes which implement the interface must implement Enqueue, Dequeue, !AddObserver and !HasNotification methods. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubinterface.gif || [#IQueueObserver IQueueObserver] || Interface which provides a mechanism for receiving notifications from classes implementing INotificationQueue interface. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubinterface.gif || [#ISyncProgressObserver ISyncProgressObserver] || Interface to observe a synchronization progress. ||
